contact_us_desc: If you have any inquiry, suggestion, or issue, feel free to reach out to our support team at support@taskify.com or call us at +1 (555) 123-4567. We are here to help you 24/7.
about_app_desc: Taskify is designed to make your life easier by helping you quickly find, book, and manage reliable home services from trusted professionals. Our mission is to simplify everyday tasks for everyone!
terms_conditions_desc:
By using Taskify, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.

- You must provide accurate information.
- Do not misuse the app or its services.
- Payments and bookings must be made through the app.
- For full details, please visit taskify.com/terms.
